formattedAddress: 689 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10039, USA
adrFormatAddress: 689 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10039, USA

editorialSummary.text: Classic soul food & sides such as fried chicken & greens offered buffet-style in a warm atmosphere.

originalText.text:
The food is always great here! Everything's well prepared, and seasoned just right. My issue is sheer volume: There's so much delicious food, you'll have a hard time deciding on what to get. No one's rude. You can eat-in.
And their cake slices, OMG! Are
so appetizing it's impossible to
pass them up, lol. Layer.
The meal is unbeatable. The cost, simply depends on how much you indulge.

originalText.text: So I had the rice & beans, corn jerk chicken , honey chicken & a slice of salmon .  Oh and some candied Yams . All this for under $12 . Great prices, Good flavor,  clean establishment. They have Glass placed on an angle around the steam tables so that if you're on the phone or just so happen to be speaking to someone you won't spit all over the food üëçüëçüëçThis place is a must try !!!

text.text: So I had the rice & beans, corn jerk chicken , honey chicken & a slice of salmon .  Oh and some candied Yams . All this for under $12 . Great prices, Good flavor,  clean establishment. They have Glass placed on an angle around the steam tables so that if you're on the phone or just so happen to be speaking to someone you won't spit all over the food üëçüëçüëçThis place is a must try !!!

originalText.text: Stumbled upon this spot right off of the 3 train with a friend of mine and was absolutely confused by the atmosphere until I figured out it was buffet style. I am not going to lie, the place is in serious need of fixing up because there is no way this spot can pass a health inspection if it is in this poor condition. But the food however was very delicious and seasoned. Me and my friend got full very quickly. The only nitpick besides the atmosphere is soul mac and cheese should not have sugar in it, AT ALL. It is slightly expensive depending on the weight of your food but it's worth trying delicious food options. The owner was very friendly too! If atmosphere is a concern, stay clear of this spot but if you want good food to-go, I recommend this place!

originalText.text: $ 7.99 lb, Delicious fresh food, salads and desserts. They have pork, spare ribs and baked ham. They have a variety of dressings and condiments. Great food and clean place to eat.

text.text: $ 7.99 lb, Delicious fresh food, salads and desserts. They have pork, spare ribs and baked ham. They have a variety of dressings and condiments. Great food and clean place to eat.

originalText.text: Due to the Pandemic, they raised thier price a little bit. This establishment only takes cash, and you pay by the pound. There isn't a big meat selection. The chicken was kinda hard, and the yams weren't good at all.
